mph.beans.sessions

Interface TeamViewerFunctionalities

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicUserManagerInterface, ProfessorManagerRemote, StudentManagerRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdministratorManager, BasicUserManager, ProfessorManager, StudentManager

    interface TeamViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about project teams.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getTeamSet

        java.util.Set<TeamIdDTO> getTeamSet(ProjectIdDTO theProjectIdDTO)
                                    throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                           UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theProjectIdDTO - the project id
        Returns:
        the set of teams enrolled in the project given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

        Returns:

                                                    throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                           UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theTeamIdDTO - the team id
        Returns:

      • getProjectTeam

        TeamIdDTO getProjectTeam(StudentIdDTO theStudentIdDTO,
                       ProjectIdDTO theProjectIdDTO)
                         throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theStudentIdDTO - the id of the student
        theProjectIdDTO - the project id
        Returns:
        the id of the team which the given student belongs to for the project given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
